text: hello everybody in this video I'm going
to be teaching you how to do three quick
simple hairstyles that you can do in
less than 10 minutes perfect for that
early morning flight you have at 6 a.m.
I don't know about you but I'd rather be
sleeping in a little bit more than
spending an hour on my hair but I still
want to look good so the three looks I'm
going to show you are the messy bun
heatless waves and faux waterfall
headband braid for the first hairstyle
you're going to want to work with
completely dry detangled hair I'm using
a wet brush which is the best for
detangling and is really gentle on your
hair at the same time then you're going
to want to add a little texture and
volume into your hair I'm doing that by
using some Redken fashion works
hairspray then you're going to want to
grab all of your hair and pull it up
into a really high ponytail
you want to take an elastic and wrap it
once halfway around your bunched up hair
then pulling the end of the ponytail
around the base creating a bun look and
then wrap the elastic around the base of
that bun sticking in those loose ends
then you're actually gonna want to start
pulling out hair from the elastic a bit
to create more of a volume and give it
that messy look if you take out too much
hair don't worry because you can just
tuck those hairs back into the elastic
dmort and perfect it looks the better
really once that's done you can pull out
a strand of hair near your ears on both
sides of your head and as well as at the
top you can even tuck your fingers
underneath the front of your hairline
and pull up a bit to create even more
volume perfect imperfection is what
we're going for with this look it's as
simple as that
the next hairstyle is one of my faves
and you can do it the night before you
leave for your early morning flight
you're going to want to wash your hair
and then let it air dry almost
completely then you're going to want to
split your hair into two sections right
down the middle then working on one side
at a time you'll want to grab a layer
from the top section of your hair like
so and split that into two then you're
going to want to take the back piece and
cross it under the front and then back
over creating a twist do this two times
then when you go to do it a third time
you're gonna want to take more hair from
the back and add it into your front hand
over and into the twist keep doing this
until you reach the base of your neck
once you get to the base of your deck
keep twisting those two pieces of hair
until you get to the end then you're
gonna want to take your hair and wrap it
into a low bun like so and secure it
with an elastic now you're going to do
the exact same thing on the other side
of your head when you're done you should
get something that looks like this
now you've basically done all of the
work now all you have to do is sleep on
it and when you wake up in the morning
you can take it all out and voila you've
got heatless waves like so easy peasy if
you want to add a little bit more
cuteness and have a couple of more
minutes of spare you can add a braid to
this hairstyle I like to throw my part
to the one side for this then taking the
side with more hair I grab a thick layer
from the top and divide it into three
sections which I use to create a basic
braid all the way down once you do that
secure it with an elastic
then you're going to want to start
taking small sections from the front of
your hair and loop it through the braid
so you're gonna want to squeeze your
fingers through the stitch of the braid
so you can pull through that front hair
once you do that clip that piece aside
so it doesn't get in your way then
you're going to want to keep grabbing
hair from the front and looping it
through the braid until you reach the
top of your ear once you've done that
grab all of the pieces you've clipped
aside and also grab some hair from the
back of your head put that all together
and secure it with an elastic and voila
I hope you enjoyed this video now when
you arrive in your new destination you
will look my fly and you know it's nice
to try some new hairstyles once in a
while instead of just having it down or
having it in a ponytail just experiment
a little bit if you enjoyed this video
give it a nice thumbs up if you did not
like this video give it a nice thumbs up
because you're a really nice person and
if you have not subscribed to my channel
be sure to do stuff like that button so
you never miss it on any upcoming videos
I'll see you guys later
happy travels
